meanings.sent1: The unhelpful teacher did not answer any questions.
meanings.sent2: It is unhelpful to ignore someone who needs help.
meanings.sent3: The unhelpful cat refused to show the mouse where the cheese was hidden.
meanings.sent4: The unhelpful rain made the outdoor party a total washout.
meanings.sent5: Her unhelpful attitude left everyone feeling lost and confused.

meanings.sent1: The unhelpful instructions only made the task more difficult.
meanings.sent2: His unhelpful behavior caused delays in the project.
meanings.sent3: The unhelpful road sign pointed in the wrong direction, leading them astray.
meanings.sent4: The unhelpful traffic jam prevented them from reaching the airport on time.
meanings.sent5: The unhelpful lock on the door kept them from entering the room.
